prob_inference_dev¶

synopsis:Cython module for inner loop methods for prob_inference in a formula_gen.PBModel.

Typedefs:

ctypedef np.int_t DINT_t
ctypedef np.float_t DFLOAT_t

Variables:

N = number of observations on a plate (see formula_gen.PBPlate).

M = number of propositional variables (see formula_gen.PBPlate).

NNodes = number of nodes in a bdd (see knowledge_compilation.BDD).

prob_inference_dev.seed_gsl_cy(unsigned int seed)¶

Seed the GNU scientific library (gsl) random number generator (rng).

Parameters:seed (unsigned int) – seed for rng
prob_inference_dev.backward_plate_cy(np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=2] bdd, np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=3] plate, np.ndarray[DFLOAT_t, ndim=2] prob)¶

Compute backward probability for a set of identical BDDs (with different parameters).

Parameters:
  • bdd (see knowledge_compilation.BDD) –
  • plate (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
Return type:

ndarray of shape [N, NNodes, 2]
prob_inference_dev.sample_bdd_plate_cy(np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=3] plate, np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=2] bdd, np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=1] reps, np.ndarray[DFLOAT_t, ndim=3] beta, np.ndarray[DFLOAT_t, ndim=2] prob, x # TODO optimize to array)¶

Sample a set of BDDs and update x. Sampling x means:

  1. backward_plate_cy()
  2. sample_bdd_plate_cy()
Parameters:
  • plate (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
  • bdd (see knowledge_compilation.BDD) –
  • reps (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
  • beta (returned by backward_plate_cy()) –
  • prob (returned by reparam_cy() (spoiler NXM ndarray)) – probabilities of the propositional variables in the BDDs
  • x (list of NDist ndarrays, each of shape n_vars X n_cat (see formula_gen.PBModel)) – datastructure for x
Return type:

None
prob_inference_dev.reparam_cy(cat_list, theta, np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=3] plate, np.ndarray[DINT_t, ndim=2] kid)¶

Compute the parameters of the propositional variables in the BDDs based on theta.

Parameters:
  • cat_list (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
  • theta (list of NDist ndarrays, each of shape n_vars X n_cat (see formula_gen.PBModel)) –
  • plate (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
  • kid (see formula_gen.PBPlate) –
Return type:

ndarray of shape N X M
